headline: Real protection for your home network, not just antivirus popups.
description: We secure your {{city_upper}} home network using professional-grade methods to protect against malware, ad tracking, and insecure IoT devices. No subscriptions. No spyware. Just control.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Smart speakers, TVs, and even light bulbs often report back to third parties, collecting data about your home and usage patterns. Many of them bypass basic router settings completely.
Most home networks are wide open to malware, ad tracking, and insecure devices. Default settings leave you vulnerable to attacks that can compromise your privacy and security.
By default, most home routers send every website you visit through your ISP's DNS servers, allowing them to log and potentially sell your data.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Set up a local DNS resolver to reduce reliance on external providers
Harden your router, firewall rules, DNS resolver, and disable insecure remote access
Isolate vulnerable smart home and IoT devices
Eliminate cloud logins, telemetry, and unnecessary manufacturer tracking

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We evaluate your current setup, then harden your internal network using open-source, local-first tooling. You stay in control, and we explain every step. No black boxes, no ongoing fees.
